title: Project scaffold and Chrome Extension Manifest V3
description: Set up the Chrome extension project structure, baseline configuration, and Manifest V3 with the required permissions and entry points (content script, background service worker, extension UI assets).

title: Define messaging contracts between content scripts, workers, and background
description: Specify the message types, payload schemas, and routing between the content script, Harper WASM worker, and background service worker. This keeps the extension modular and testable.

title: Content script: detect editable fields and capture text changes
description: Implement the content script responsible for identifying inputs/textarea/contenteditable fields, tracking user typing, and sending incremental updates into the analysis pipeline.

title: Harper WASM integration in a Web Worker
description: Integrate Harper as a WebAssembly module running in a worker for fast, local grammar checks with low latency. Expose a clean interface to the content script.

title: Background service worker: LLM requests and API key storage
description: Implement the background service worker that securely stores the API key, performs debounced LLM calls, and returns AI suggestions to the content script.

title: Suggestion UI: underlines, popovers, and accept/dismiss actions
description: Build the in-page UI for local and AI suggestions, including underlines, popovers, and user actions. The UI must be lightweight and non-intrusive.

title: Settings UI and privacy messaging
description: Add a simple settings view for entering the API key and explain privacy practices clearly to users. This should include opt-in language for AI calls.
